title: FULL SHOW: We Chat With Steve Lacy, Freaky Friday, Talk Sex With Ghosts and More
itunes:title: FULL SHOW: We Chat With Steve Lacy, Freaky Friday, Talk Sex With Ghosts and More
description:
Today on The Breakfast Club, we are joined by the artist with the number one song in the world, Steve Lacy. Later on during Freaky Friday, we talk threesomes.... And during Rumor Rumor report, we talk about Joy Behar saying she has had sex with "multiple ghosts" 

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
